ID First Last Birth Year Death Year
{{ inventor.id }} {{ inventor.first }} {{ inventor.last }} {{ inventor.year }} {{ inventor.passed }}
Image Product Code Release Date Description Price Star Rating
{{product.productname}} {{product.productCode}} {{product.releaseDate}} {{product.description}} {{product.price}} {{product.starRating}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import { Inventor } from './Inventor';
import { Iproduct } from './Iproduct';



@Component({
  selector: 'app-roots',
  templateUrl: './app.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss']
})


export class AppComponent {
  title = 'Vannand'
  student = {
    hoten: 'Do Minh Van',
    gioitinh: 'nam',
    ngaysinh:'19/06/2004',
    anh:'https://cdn.sforum.vn/sforum/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/avatar-trang-4.jpg',
    diemTB: 8.9
  }
inventors:Inventor[] = [
  { id: 1, first: 'Albert', last: 'Einstein', year: 1879, passed: 1955 },
  { id: 2, first: 'Isaac', last: 'Newton', year: 1643, passed: 1727 },
  { id: 3, first: 'Galileo', last: 'Galilei', year: 1564, passed: 1642 },
  { id: 4, first: 'Marie', last: 'Curie', year: 1867, passed: 1934 },
  { id: 5, first: 'Johannes', last: 'Kepler', year: 1571, passed: 1630 }
];

products: Iproduct[] =[
  
    {
      "productId": 1,
      "productName": "Leaf Rake",
      "productCode": "GDN-0011",
      "releaseDate": "March 19, 2016",
      "description": "Leaf rake with 48-inch wooden handle.",
      "price": 19.95,
      "starRating": 3.2,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 2,
      "productName": "Garden Cart",
      "productCode": "GDN-0023",
      "releaseDate": "April 15, 2017",
      "description": "Garden cart with 4 wheels and 300-pound capacity.",
      "price": 49.95,
      "starRating": 4.5,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 3,
      "productName": "Hammer",
      "productCode": "TBX-0048",
      "releaseDate": "May 21, 2018",
      "description": "Hammer with 16-inch handle and 22-ounce head.",
      "price": 9.95,
      "starRating": 4.8,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 4,
      "productName": "Tape Measure",
      "productCode": "TBX-0052",
      "releaseDate": "June 30, 2019",
      "description": "Tape measure with 25-foot length and fractional readings.",
      "price": 4.95,
      "starRating": 4.2,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 5,
      "productName": "Lawn Mower",
      "productCode": "GDN-0055",
      "releaseDate": "July 15, 2020",
      "description": "Lawn mower with 20-inch cutting width and 150cc engine.",
      "price": 149.95,
      "starRating": 4.0,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 6,
      "productName": "Hedge Trimmer",
      "productCode": "GDN-0060",
      "releaseDate": "August 20, 2020",
      "description": "Hedge trimmer with 24-inch cutting length and 40-volt battery.",
      "price": 79.95,
      "starRating": 4.6,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 7,
      "productName": "Pest Control",
      "productCode": "GDN-0065",
      "releaseDate": "September 10, 2020",
      "description": "Pest control with 10 traps and non-toxic bait.",
      "price": 29.95,
      "starRating": 4.1,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 8,
      "productName": "Fertilizer",
      "productCode": "GDN-0070",
      "releaseDate": "October 15, 2020",
      "description": "Fertilizer with 10-10-10 NPK formula and 20-pound bag.",
      "price": 39.95,
      "starRating": 4.4,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"
    },
    {
      "productId": 9,
      "productName": "Pruning Saw",
      "productCode": "TBX-0075",
      "releaseDate": "November 20, 2020",
      "description": "Pruning saw with 6-inch blade and ergonomic handle.",
      "price": 14.95,
      "starRating": 4.7,
      "imageUrl": "http://openclipart.org/image/300px/svg_to_png/26215/Anonymous_Leaf_Rake.png"

]
